synopsis.text:
Hayate, Nagi, and their friends find themselves at the end of summer, seeking respite in a tranquil countryside retreat, far removed from the hustle and bustle of city life and modern technology. However, their peaceful getaway takes an unexpected turn when an enigmatic spirit throws their lives into chaos.

As the group struggles to adapt to their new environment, Nagi and Hayate find themselves inexplicably thrust into separate realities. Hayate is left to navigate a world where his mistress is no longer Nagi, but Maria, leaving him bewildered and desperate for answers. Meanwhile, Nagi finds herself trapped in a sinister amusement park, with no escape in sight.

As the butler and mistress grapple with their bizarre circumstances, they must find a way to reunite and restore their original reality. With a mysterious silver-haired woman holding the key to their predicament, Hayate and Nagi's relationship is put to the ultimate test as they embark on a perilous journey to find each other and unravel the truth behind their strange new worlds.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
